about_the_game:
Cabin Rush is a unique blend of the open world survival and tower defense. Using a randomly generated open world, you and your trusty pet explore and gather resources to build traps, towers, and walls around your cabin. Each night, waves of monsters come and try to destroy your home. You must balance your own health and safety and that of the cabin to win the night.

Explore:
During the day, you explore, chop down trees, mine rock, and more to gather resources.

Build Defenses
Before nightfall, you use the resources you've gathered to build a variety of traps, walls, and defense towers to protect your home


Defend the Cabin
Once the sun goes down, you must defend your cabin by fighting, building additional traps, and leading enemies into traps or by towers.


Upgrade
Once the wave of enemies has been defeated, research how to build new items or learn new abilities
